name: War Hammer+
description: Crafted from pure iron, this large Hammer boasts improved Attack power.

name: War Mace
description: Crafted from pure iron, this large Hammer boasts improved Attack power.

name: Large Bone Club
description: An unidentifiable, club-like bone useful only for training purposes.

name: Cyclo-Hammer
description: Crafted from superior bone,this Hammer boasts improved Attack. The standard-bearer.

name: Tarnished Hammer
description: A tarnished Hammer that isn't good for much as-is. But if you polish it...

name: Iron Striker
description: Enormous Hammer made from a solid lump of iron. Incredible power.

name: Iron Striker+
description: Enormous Hammer made from a solid lump of iron. Incredible power.

name: Bone Axe
description: Streamlined for easy swinging. Looks like an Axe but it's actually a Hammer.

name: Spiked Hammer
description: Incorporates improved Needleberry spikes that can be released when charged.

name: Spiked Hammer+
description: Incorporates improved Needleberry spikes that can be released when charged.

name: Enormous Ham
description: An enormous, juicy ham. A spicy exterior with a juicy interior.

name: Atlas Hammer
description: Crafted from superior bone,this Hammer boasts improved Attack. The standard-bearer.

name: Skullcrusher
description: Inlayed with numerous fangs, this hammer could crush a wyvern's skull to dust.

name: Skullcrusher+
description: Inlaid with numerous fangs, this hammer could crush a wyvern's skull to dust.

name: Conehead Hammer
description: Hammer made from Blango family materials. Its blow can chill the soul.

name: Bull Hammer
description: Hammer made from Bullfango, a beast whose merciless charge is feared by hunters.

name: Gunhammer Prototype
description: Made in a distant town, this Hammer is the subject of envy in many workshops.

name: Anchor Hammer
description: Enormous anchor-like Hammer packed with a sailor's passion for the sea.

name: Black Cauldron
description: Used by the iron men of the kitchen. Nothing can escape this chef's dungeon!

name: Crystal Hammer
description: Improved Spiked Hammer. Made via the generous use of expensive crystals.

name: Kut-Ku Jaw
description: Improved Atlas Hammer. Quality Hammer made from Yian Kut-Ku beak.

name: Dynamic Hammer
description: Made from the beak of a Blue Kut-Ku. You can hear the echo of anguished cries.

name: Venom Monster
description: A grotesquely monstrous Hammer, utilizing a specially concocted poison.

name: Jail Hammer
description: Uses Thunderbugs to stun monsters and render them paralyzed.

name: Dragonhead Hammer
description: Large bone hammer with a shell made from a wyvern's skull. Beautiful and deadly.

name: Bull Head Hammer
description: Oriental in origins, this hammer is made from hard charging Bulldrome.

name: Anchor Hammer+
description: Enormous anchor-like Hammer packed with a sailor's passion for the sea.

name: One Star Silver Pot
description: A splendid cooking pot. The soul of a chef, it turns the ordinary into a delicacy.

name: Bone Broadaxe
description: Streamlined for easy swinging. Looks like an Axe but it's actually a Hammer.

name: Crystal Nova
description: Improved Spiked Hammer. Made via the generous use of expensive crystals.

name: Gigaton Hammer
description: Heavyweight Hammer made with Gravios Shell. One hit can shatter rock.

name: Shell Hammer
description: Uses poison Basarios Shell. Occasionally poisons its monster foes.

name: Kut-Ku Pick
description: A new version of the famed Kut-Ku Hammer. Made to order and incredibly hard to find.

name: Binder Mace
description: Uses Thunderbugs to stun monsters and render them paralyzed.

name: Diablos Maul
description: Improved Skullcrusher. A treasured Hammer made from a Diablos Tail.

name: Basarios Blow
description: Made by attaching the hardest face plating of an adolescent Basarios.

name: Conehead Hammer+
description: Hammer made from Blango family materials, its blow can chill the soul.

name: Bull Tusk Hammer
description: Oriental in origins, this hammer is made from hard charging Bulldrome.

name: Black Cat Stamp
description: Made to resemble a black cat with a devious smile. A rare, highly desired colour.

name: Teddybear
description: A stuffed animal popular among ladies living in Guild towns. Cuddle time?

name: Anvil Hammer
description: An anvil from the armory,re-forged into a massive Hammer. Holds its sharpness.

name: Onslaught Hammer
description: Turns an anvil, the soul of a workshop, into a powerful Hammer. High sharpness.

name: Dead Revolver
description: Made using the latest Wyverian technology. A masterpiece in workmanship.

name: Titan Hammer
description: Heavyweight Hammer made with Gravios Shell. One hit can shatter rock.

name: Graviton Hammer
description: Uses poison Basarios Shell. Occasionally poisons its monster foes.

name: Raven Torrent
description: The sharpened beak of a Yian Garuga. This black Hammer's power is devastating.

name: Finishing Hammer
description: Improved Skullcrusher. A treasured hammer made from a Diablos Tail.

name: Ancient Relic
description: Large bone hammer with a shell made from a wyvern's skull. Beautiful and deadly.

name: Breath Core Hammer
description: Modern version of an ancient War Hammer. Fueled by the power of dragon breath.

name: Jadite Mace
description: Also known as the Dragon's Crown of Flame, it's strike is like that of a meteor.

name: Jade Mace
description: Also known as the Dragon's Crown of Flame, it's strike is like that of a meteor.

name: Green Monster
description: A large Hammer thought up at the workshop during some downtime. Very spiky!

name: Dragonbreaker
description: The claw of lao-shan, legend says that this ancient weapon has the power to slay dragons.

name: War Stamp
description: Devoid of elemental powers, but capable of destruction. Can crush wyvern skull.

name: Iron Devil
description: Primitive weapon used before hammers became widely avaliable.

name: Great Demon Hammer
description: Before the Hammer was embraced by all, this one was loved by a single elder.

name: Sanctioned Gunhammer
description: As a result of technological advancements, this weapon has increased attack power.

name: Anchor Crusher
description: Enormous anchor-like Hammer packed with a sailor's passion for the sea.

name: True Black Cauldron
description: Used by the iron men of the kitchen. Nothing can escape this chefs dungeon!

name: Bone Great Axe
description: Streamlined for easy swinging. Looks like an Axe but it's actually a Hammer.

name: Great Nova
description: Made of the hardest of crystals. Absurdly priced, it is offered by the Guild.

name: Torment Hammer
description: Forged of strange ores, a Hammer of feverish torment set to melt its foes.

name: Ham of Hams
description: An enormous, juicy ham. Spicy exterior with a juicy interior. Truly first class.

name: Hard Bone Hammer
description: Hammer made from superior quality bone. Boorish, it proves its material's power.

name: Hard Bone Hammer+
description: Hammer made from superior quality bone. Boorish, it proves its material's power.

name: Diablos Hammer
description: Red and black horn combined so that you can almost feel the power of Diablos.

name: Lobster Hammer
description: Made from a lobster shell. Like its material, it increases Water element.

name: Violence Hammer
description: Made from the beak of a Blue Kut-Ku. You can hear the echo of anguished cries.

name: Weathered Hammer
description: A Hammer weathered in an unexpected manner. If it were to be refitted...?

name: White Cat Hammer
description: Hammer made to resemble the head of a Felyne. A popular weapon with Felyne Fans.

name: Black Cat Hammer
description: Made to resemble a black cat with a devious smile. A rare, highly desired color.

description: Devoid of elemental powers, but capable of destruction. Can crush wyvern skull.

description: Sticks and Stones may break bones, but a giant bone fist breaks them... painfully.

name: Two Star Silver Pot
description: A splendid cooking pot. The soul of a chef, it turns the ordinary into a delicacy.

description: Hammer made from Blangonga family materials, its blow can chill the soul.

name: Tigrex Hammer
description: Hammer made from Tigrex materials. One blow is enough to shatter the earth.

name: Hidden Breaker
description: Jet-black Hammer. A single hit feels like the weight of darkness descending.

name: Devil Masher
description: Golden Hammer used by the first man to hunt with a hammer.

name: Ancient Blow
description: Those holding this blade are forever locked in struggle with the elder dragons.

name: Lunastra's Crown
description: Also known as the Dragon's Crown of Flame, it's strike is like that of a meteor.

name: Daora's Colossus
description: Hammer made from the fusion of Kushala Daora materials and an ancient Hammer.

name: Expert Hammer
description: Inscribed with "Good Job", this Hammer is given to the top students in training.

name: Fatalis Buster
description: Sacred weapon that enshrines Fatalis. 'The land is its life and demands sacrifice.

name: AncientFatalisBuster
description: Giant white Hammer embodying the tremendous power of a Fatalis' ancestor.

name: Dragon Demolisher
description: Club made from a defeated wyvern and dyed a deep blue. A menacing dragon killer.

name: Gold Cat Hammer
description: A Cat Hammer with a rare golden sheen. Coveted even among nobility.

name: Blacksmith
description: Iron hammer with destructive powers. None can stop the wielder who swings it.

name: Juggernaut
description: Super-destructive metallic Hammer. Once in motion, not even a horde can stop it.
